1.content: Who is the lucky guy, what kind of relationship is he in, and how did he screwed up?
1.title: What did he do this time?

choices: She is obviously still angry but giving him the silent treatment
11.content:
“Oh come on! You have got to be kidding me!” Rick mutters to himself as he sees yet another store close its doors to him.

Rick is a married man that had forgotten his wife’s birthday one time too many, causing her to unload all the frustration she had been holding in all at once. He didn’t see what she had to be stressed about but since he was just rushed out of his own house he really didn’t put much thought into why she was made he just wanted to find something to quickly diffuse the situation.

Unfortunately for him he had completely forgotten about her birthday and spent the whole night at the office so now the jewelry store was closed and so was the flower shop. He was now all alone walking down the vacant sidewalk casually peering into the dark store windows when he heard someone whistling.

He then looked up to see a shady figure pushing a cart with a single lamp to light his way in front of him.

“Well hey there, now what might I ask has you out this late?” the man asks, Rick pauses for a moment to look the guy over, “Well I could ask you the same question, I can’t imagine you get much business out this late.” He says

“Well you would be surprised how many times I find a young man like yourself rushing down these streets looking for something at the last minute.” He says smiling, Rick was stunned and a little concerned as to the accuracy of the man’s response.

“So is there something I can help you with or do you always take walks this late at night?” he asks

“Okay normally I would say you’re crazy but right now I don’t have time to argue, let me see what you’ve got.” Rick says

“Ah I’ve got just the thing for you.” The man says rummaging through his cart, “Here we are, the perfect thing to show a woman how much she means to you.” He says, Rick begins to smile from the description but looks down in disappointment as the man hands him a small booklet.

“Wait what are these?” he asks, “Love coupons of course, any man can buy a big bouquet of roses or an expensive piece of jewelry when he is looking for forgiveness but Love coupons say that I’m willing to put forth the effort to make you happy.” He says smiling

Rick looks down at his watch, “Okay okay how much?” he asks, “It is on the house, now just sign here.” He says flipping the booklet over.

“Thank you so much.” Rick says as he shakes the man’s hand and rushes back to his house.

As he stands at the front door he takes a deep breath, stands up straight and opens the door.
11.title: Rick

choices: She decides to look at them later
The pages are blank (They will appear depending on what she wants him to do)
111.content:
The second Rick steps through the door, “Welcome home honey!” his wife Lillie says sarcastically, “I’m glad you’re back cause I’m not done with you!” she exclaims, “But baby I…” he tries to say until she cuts him off, “Don’t but baby me you worthless piece of… Ah!! You just make me so mad! You know my mother always said that you weren’t good enough for me! That you wouldn’t take this marriage seriously! And I would regret ever giving you the time…” She says until he quickly crosses the room and gets down on his knees in front of her, “Lillian I know I may not get all the dates right but you know I love you, and I want to prove it.” He says presenting the booklet to here.

“What is this suppose to be?” she says taking it from his hands, “They are called love coupons, they are like IOUs that I will honor whenever you want, no matter what I’m doing.” He says

“Really?” she asks calming down and smiling hopefully, “Of course, see look on the back.” He says flipping it over in her hand, “I signed on the dotted line so that means I’m all yours.” He says smiling

“Aww baby!” she says wrapping her arms around him for a deep passionate kiss.

“Well why don’t we try one out right now? I mean it is still my birthday.” She says smiling opening the booklet.

The first one she sees is...
111.title: She yells at him

choices: She grabs the booklet and runs to the bedroom
1111.content:
She goes to open the booklet but before she could read the first coupon Rick stops her, placing his hand over hers.

“You don’t have to use them already, how about a foot rub on the house?” he asks,

“Aww baby.” She says, “Or how about a shower for two instead?” she suggests, “Sounds great, now why don’t I put the book somewhere safe and we can get this celebrations started.” He says reaching for the book.

“Well if this is on the house, why don’t you get the water started and I’ll be right behind you.” She says gesturing to the master bathroom.

“Ah yeah great idea… one hot shower coming up.” He said

He then walks into the bathroom and starts the water. “Well at least I’m off the hook for now, and maybe this is better, since she was the one who puts it somewhere I just have to help her misplace it and I’ll be off the hook without even doing anything. I mean I’m sure there are plenty of fun coupons in there but I don’t plan on honoring any of the sweet sappy ones.” He thinks to himself sneaking around the house to see where she put the booklet.

He peers around the corner to see her place it on the kitchen table.

“Hey baby, are you ready for me?” she exclaims still thinking he is in the back of the house. He quickly rush back to make it looks like he was coming to get her.

“Oh yeah baby.” He says

The two of them then proceed back down the hall and enjoy their shower. Afterwards the fun continued in the bedroom. And when she was satisfied and resting, Rick made his way back to the kitchen to clear off the table and the counters, he even washed the dishes all to mask his disposal of the booklet into the trash.

Until he turns around to see her standing there, “Wow this is a surprise.” She says smiling, “Baby I swear it’s not what it looks like…” Rick says quickly, “Wait so you’re not cleaning?” she says laughing, “Ah… I mean... It’s not… done yet…” he says smiling.

“Well honey it looks great.” She says walking over to the table. “Hey what happened to the booklet? I know I put it right here.” She says

He then glances over to the trashcan. She notices and rushes over to the see a new bag and only one thing at the very bottom. She then looks to him with the same infuriating stare that she had met you with earlier this evening.

“Baby I can explain…” he says quickly, “Well let me take a stab at it. You wanted to make the gesture without having to do anything! I should have known it was too good to be true!” she exclaims

“No baby I…” he says.
1111.title: She decides to look at them later

11112.content:
“AH! I can’t even look at you right now!” she exclaims,

She then reaches into the bag and pulls out the booklet, “I hope you had fun tonight because you’re going to be sleeping on the couch until I can stand to be in the same room with you. And no more skipping out on your commitments, if you know what’s good for you you’ll see this one through!” she says storming down the hallway.

He then takes a deep breath in defeat and lays down on the couch.

Meanwhile she is trying to calm down, but thinking about it only made it worse, bringing back all the memories of every promise he had ever broken.

As worked up as she was she knew that tomorrow was going to be a long day and she needed her sleep.
11112.title: She grabs the booklet and runs to the bedroom

111122.content:
The next morning she wakes up to find that she is already fifteen minutes late for work! She was so frustrated last night she must have forgotten to set her alarm clock.

She jumps out of bed, strips off her pajamas and quickly jumps in and out of the shower. Then she rummages through her closet to find something to wear and quickly throws it on, no time to iron anything. She grabs her purse and rushes out the front door but she quickly realizes that she doesn’t have her keys, so she rushes back into the house, passing Rick on the couch and waking him up.

“Wow hey what’s the rush!” he asks half way asleep, “Not now Rick, I’m late for work and I can’t find my keys!” she says rummaging around the kitchen. “AH! This is all your fault!” she exclaims, “Me? It’s not my fault you’re not organized.” He says getting up off the couch, “Don’t start that again, and after your stunt last night I forgot to set my alarm!” she says rushing past him back to the bedroom.

“Yeah yeah find your keys and yell at me later, I’m going back to sleep.” Rick says. “Rick! All of us aren’t lucky enough to have weekends off.” She says out of frustration, at this point she didn’t know what to say anymore.

She pauses from her search to catch her breath and calm down. She was going to be late if she didn’t get on the road quick but she really didn’t want to, she couldn’t remember the last time she had a day off. And with that a strange light caught her attention, she looks over to see the coupon booklet glowing and right next to it lay the keys she had been looking for.

Relieved she walked over to the dresser and picked up her keys, she had just enough time to get to work. But it was hard to ignore a glowing stack of paper just laying there. So she picks it up and flips it to the first coupon which read: “This coupon entitles the holder to one day off from work.”

At first she was confused and a little upset that the coupons were just a joke gift, because she highly doubted her boss would accept it. But then she thought it might be worth a laugh later so she ripped it out of the booklet.

A moment later she found herself laying on the couch. And it didn’t take her long to realize that something wasn’t right. Suddenly she hears a very familiar scream coming from the bedroom. She jumps up and rushes to see what happened, only to confirm what she had expected. She was looking at herself standing in front of the dresser holding the coupon, she the catches her own reflection in the mirror, she was in Ricks body.

“What’s going on? Who are you!?” She asks, “I’m Rick! Who are you!?” he exclaimed, “So wait we’re in each other’s bodies? But how?” Rick asked taking a good look at his current body in the mirror.

“I don’t know, but I ended up on the couch after I ripped that out of the coupon book u gave me.” She says pointing to the coupon in Rick’s hand, Rick then reads the coupon, “What? A day off?” he asks

“Yeah I was frustrated and then the thing started glowing and then I ripped it out and this…” She says gesturing to her new body.

“Wait how does this give you a day… oh…” he says looking in the mirror at his female body dressed for work, he then looks up to see a smile on his former face, “NO, this is my day off and im going back to bed, then I’m going to wake up and everything will be back to normal.” He says walking back to the living room.

“I don’t think so, you have 10 minutes to get to work, so don’t forget your keys and have a good day sweetheart.” He says guiding him to the front door.

“No, I can’t do this.” He says, “Of course you can, and chances are you don’t have a choice.” She says, “Wait what do you mean?” he asks, “Well if the coupon is for a day off then it probably won’t ware off until after you do it.” She says smiling

Chills run down Ricks spin at the thought but he decides not think about it and get to work first. He rushed to the car and hits the road. Meanwhile his wife takes his body back inside and sits down on the couch
111122.title: The Next Morning

choices: Goes with first choice, be Rick
Goes with second choice, shopping as Rick
1111221.content:
Lillie plopped down on the couch shaking her head in amazement. “Well, this is definitely not what I had expected from that little card. Serves that asshole right, after all he hasn’t done for me,” she said out loud. Five years of marriage and he hadn’t remember one single important date; birthdays, anniversary, she thought to herself.

She sat and stared at her hands, arms and body. This was so surreal and yet incredible. This can’t be real she thought as she felt her now flat chest but yet it felt real. Lillie got up and went to the bathroom to look at herself closer.

She was amazed as she looked at the reflection. She was Rick. She continued to touch and feel herself all over trying to make sense of it. It was so strange to look down and not see her breasts, instead seeing a muscular chest. Her whole body really was his, she realized. Lillie was quite familiar with her husband’s member, but this was a whole new perspective. She took a few moments to check it out. It was very strange seeing a man’s genitals hanging between her legs. She wondered if there were any coupons that would allow her to put this to use as she reached down to touch it.
Having felt satisfied with her exploration at this time, she put it back in her underwear and pulled up her pants.

As Lillie washed up her stomach growled so she decided to go to the kitchen and look for something to eat. An urge to eat some of his unhealthy cereal coming to her. Lillie wondered what to do with the day. There were two options that came to her, one was to just be like Rick and laze around doing nothing, but that would just most likely result in her having more work to do when she got back to her body. The second was to take advantage of this time to go and buy herself some gifts since Rick had forgot yet again. It be her gifts to herself from Rick and even though he won’t have to do it, he’ll be the one to pay for it. Lillie struggled with making a choice, the first one was becoming appealing to her, she almost felt as if she wanted to act like him. It had been his day off, but now it was her's and the thought of laying around watching T.V. and sports was really sounding good. That disturbed her as she never had any desire to watch sports. The second was a better choice in her favor, his money and presents for her. She would be able to buy herself something nice, though she wouldn't be able to try anything on. But she would come off looking like a loving husband. Maybe Rick would learn something from it.

As she walked along she unconsciously reached in pants pocket and pulled something out. Without thinking about it she put it in her mouth and flicked a lighter she had pulled out of the other pocket. Lillie found herself taking a drag off of a cigarette. “Aw shit, I just lit a cigarette and didn’t even realize I was doing it. Well, that’s great, I got his friggin’ habit,” she said out loud to no one. Damn Rick and his bad habit, which was another issue that Lillie hated. She had never taken up the habit nor cared for it, even though he had tried to get her to try it. She had been on him to quit for sometime and now she was standing here smoking. She felt like a hypocrite. She walked into the kitchen with the intention of putting it out, but instead found herself just flicking the ashes in an ashtray and taking another drag. Shit, I can’t even make myself put it out she realized.

She found the thought of eating the sugary mess becoming more desirable as she started grabbing a bowl, milk and a box of cereal. Lillie felt relief as she took one last drag from the cigarette and snubbed it out in the ashtray, then disappointment as she was already wanting another. She pushed to the back of her mind and started fixing a big bowl of cereal. She eagerly ate it, disgusted at her husband’s habits that she wasn’t able to control. Three bowls of cereal later she put everything away and cleaned up, although she came close to just leaving it.
1111221.title: Stay with Her

choices: Rick still has work to do
11112211.content:
Lillie just sat on the couch thinking about going out and doing some shopping for herself. She kept thinking and thinking about the things she could be doing right now, but instead she was just sitting there. Before she knew it an hour had gone by and the only productive thing she'd done was make a dent in the pack of cigarettes. "I can see how Rick can just lose track of times like this, but that's not an excuse!" Lillie said to herself as she lit another cigarette and thought about all the things that her husband did that made her so mad. "He's such a lazy slob. All he does is work when he has to, eat, smoke, sleep, and repeat. He could be out there making a real difference in the world but no. Whenever he has the time to do something for us he just does nothing. I can't believe that man." She went for another cigarette but found she was out, "I'm going to have to go out and get more of these. After I get something to eat." With the Lillie stood her husbands body up and got a new bowl and put it down beside the dirty one and poured up another bowl of cereal. She sat eating before deciding she needed to go out and do the shopping.

But before she could even make it out of the kitchen she said, "Well...it is getting late. And I would have to shower and get dressed in order to go out. Besides, Rick will be back any minute and he'll probably want to talk or something." So after a day of accomplishing nothing, Lillie went back to the couch, turned on some college football for background noise and fell asleep.

She was awakened a few hours later by the sound of Rick pulling up in her car. "Looks like the missus is home." Lillie chuckled to herself as Rick entered the couples home.
11112211.title: Goes with first choice, be Rick

choices: Rick is a dutiful wife and starts in on all of Lillie's chores.
While changing clothes, Rick stumbled across the book of coupons!
111122112.content:
Rick entered the house, scowling at Lillie in his old body.

“Well?” he demanded in her voice, with his hands on his hips in that same angry, impatient gesture she had used on him so many times.

“Well what, babe?” Lillie grinned, sipping at her beer and letting out a belch.

“I want my body back!” Rick demanded, stomping his dainty little foot on the floor. “I thought your stupid little coupon gave you one day off. Why am I still you?”

“I guess my day off isn't through yet,” Lillie said with a wink. There was something cute about Rick getting all angry and flustered while in her old body. Lillie reached down to her crotch and scratched her new anatomy, not consciously noticing it was becoming a bit aroused. Perhaps it was the beer or perhaps it was just spending the day with a bloodstream full of testosterone? But for the first time in her life, Lillie genuinely admired her own former body as being truly beautiful.

“Well, my day is through,” Rick said angrily, dropping his purse on the floor. “I slaved away as you all day, Lillie. And I can tell you, I don't like being a woman! So, yes: fine, you win that argument. Guys have it better than girls. Being a woman sucks. I was wrong, blah blah blah, learned my lesson. Now change us back. Please!”

“I didn't switch us around,” Lillie said calmly, a tranquil smile on her face as she relaxed and stretched out. “The coupon changed us, babe. The coupon will change us back.”

“When?” demanded Rick.

“Probably when the day is done,” Lillie said, admiring the curves of Rick's womanly figure.

“The day is done!” whined Rick.

“The workday is done,” corrected Lillie. “The day continues. Who knows when we switch back? Maybe at sunset … maybe after twenty-four hours have passed … maybe just after you've done all my chores for the day? After all, the coupon was intended for me to get a full day of peace and quiet.”

“You want me to cook dinner for you?” gasped Rick, his little jaw dropping in horror.

“You are my wife,” grinned Lillie. “And normally, yes: I cook dinner for you each night after I get home from work. After that, I usually run a load of laundry for you, so there's clean clothes for you in the morning. I think that's it though … no, wait! Tonight I've got Zumba classes at the adult learning annex. So you'll have to go work out as me. Gotta keep that girlish figure of yours, Rick!”

Again Lillie winked lasciviously at her husband.

“Lillie, please,” he implored. “I've learned my lesson. Can't we just call the whole thing off?”

“I'm not in control,” said Lillie with an innocent smile. “It's the coupon. Now get into the kitchen, little lady. I'd like to enjoy dinner before I'm eligible for social security. And don't forget to start a load of laundry right after dinner. You can fold clothes after you get back from your Zumba class.”

“I hate being you,” groaned Rick, wandering back to the kitchen.

“Hey, don't start cooking in my professional work clothes!” shouted Lillie. “Go change clothes. I don't want you spilling stuff and staining those.”

“I hear and obey,” sighed Rick, trudging away from the kitchen and off to the bedroom.
111122112.title: Rick still has work to do

choices: Rick and Lillie finally swap back
Rick still has one more duty to fulfill as the wife
1111221121.content:
"Stupid coupons. Stupid work. Stupid Lillie. Stupid chores. Stupid stupid stupid." Rick said to himself as he looked in the refrigerator for inspiration. After staring into the mysterious giant rectangle of food Rick finally decided on the uncooked roast. "This will do, while it cooks I can do that other stupid stuff." Rick had never really done any real cooking before outside of using the microwave but that didn't stop good old Rick who straight up put the unseasoned roast in the oven and turned the oven on for two hours without even preheating. "There, now onto the laundry."

Rick went around the house scavenging for every bit of loose clothing that he could find, and scavenge was the correct word. He was finding cloths behind cabinets, under chairs, and even under his former butt.

"Come on Lillie, get up, you want me to do the laundry, now help me out."

"Fine." Said the irritable Lillie who instead of actually standing up and giving Rick the dirty cloths simply rolled over as far as he could without actually getting up so that Rick could grab it. "There you go."

"Really Lillie? You can just grab it and hand it to me?"

"I don't want to miss a second of the game."

"You wouldn't be missing anything! Besides it's a freaking commercial!"

"Meehh," Lillie groaned rolling back to her place as soon as Rick grabbed what appeared to be a dirty sock.

So Rick through all of the cloths and towels into one load and managed to shove everything into one load after squashing everything down. "Man, how the hell does she do this? It's going to need lots of soap." And so Rick tossed a couple of cups of detergent into the washing load and started it. "I'm off to that Zumba thing!" Rick shouted and after Lillie grunted in recognition Rick headed off to Zumba while still wearing Lillies work cloths.

An hour later Rick stumbled back into the living room dripping in sweat. Turns out Zumba isn't very fun or comfortable when done in work cloths. First thing he did was grab the roast out of the oven and put it on the table and next he put the very soapy dirty cloths out of the poor washing machine and stuffed it in the dryer. Letting out a sigh of relief Rick shouted out to Lillie. "Okay Lillie, I'm done!"
1111221121.title: The dutiful wife does 'her' duties

choices: A week later Lillie uses a coupon for fun
A month later Lillie uses a coupon out of anger
11112211211.content:
As soon as the roast was set on the table and Rick called out to his wife he suddenly found himself sitting back on his couch with the football game blaring on the tv. Giddily stunned to be back on the couch Rick gave himself a quick pat down to make sure he was 100% Rick again. "I'm back baby."

"And so am I." Lillie said entering the room with a beer, "Scoot over, I want to finish watching this game."

"Sound great Lil. You mind grabbing me one..." Rick stopped himself remembering the coupons, :"You know what, I'll get my own beer."

"Suit yourself," Lillie said plopping down back in Rick's old spot, when Rick got back he made a mental note that he should probably let her do whatever she wants, atleast for a while. One football game later the two continued to sit on the couch lazily. "Honey? Did you not give me a shower after the Zumba class?" Lillie asked. "Nope." Rick said, "But judging by the way I smell now you didn't exactly keep my body in pristine shape."

"I had stuff to do." Lillie said feebly. "I think I'll go ahead and get a shower now." Lillie said finally getting up and just before leaving the room said to her husband as she started to strip down, "Care to join me?"

"I think I'm going to get a bite to eat fir...oh! I'm right behind you babe!" Rick said after reading through Lillie's not so subtle offer.

And thanks to the coupons Rick and Lillie had their first great night together in ages. The only question is, how long before Lillie would go back to the coupons and for what reason?
11112211211.title: Rick and Lillie finally swap back

choices: Rick and Lillie swap bodies again for the day
Rick turns into a woman for Lillie to hang out with all day
111122112111.content:
It had been a week and Rick was still on his best behavior. Every day after he got back from work Rick was making sure that he would always ask Lillie how her day went and even made a few feeble attempts at cooking again. Lillie noticed the little changes in Rick and although she suspected that it was only out of fear that she would use the coupons (which she kept on her at all times), but she appreciated what Rick was trying to do and hadn't touched the coupons since the first incident.

But now it was a new Saturday and Rick was back to his old habits of being lazy and sitting on the couch watching the ballgames. Lillie came into the living room fully dressed with her purse in tow and looked at Rick disappointed. "Rick, what are you doing sitting there? You promised me weeks ago you'd help me go shopping for a new outfit for the party next month. I got the day off and everything for it."

"Nuh uh, I didn't agree to that. Why would I say something dumb like that?" Rick said accusingly.

"Well, you were sitting in that exact spot watching the same channel watching the same sport. Now get dressed, we've got a long day ahead of us."

Groaning Rick said without thinking, "Why can't you just get on of your girlfriends to shop with you, they'd probably be more useful than me anyways."

Lillie was about to snap, but her tensing up face suddenly turned into a big grin, "You know what, that sounds like a good idea. Good thinking Rick."

"Yeah." Rick said as he turned his attention back to the tv.

"Let's see let's see. I know, let's try a 'special' day pass. I think that sounds like it could be fun."

"Yeah, whatever." Rick said assuming that Lillie was talking into a cell phone when he saw that her cell was on the table. Confused he turned to look at his wife and saw her rip out a coupon before he could protest.
111122112111.title: A week later Lillie uses a coupon for fun

choices: Lillie decides to invite some friends to join them
1111221121112.content:
The second Rick saw the coupon be ripped out he felt his stomach drop. After a second he realized that he was still siting on the couch and assumed that the magic didn't work this time around. "Hah! Didn't work! In your face!...Hey, what's with my voice?" Rick said suddenly realizing his voice sounded a bit...higher than normal. Then Rick suddenly noticed a lot of other changes. He realized that his undershirt was occupied not by his normal man boobs, but with significantly larger full fledged womanly bosoms. As he looked down at them in awe he saw his now very long bangs fall down in front of his face, he quickly brushed the hair out of his eyes and noticed that his hands were very smooth and had long fingernails extending out. Rick stood up to take in the rest of the changes that he didn't even need to check to know had happened. His hips and ass were extended out, his legs were now smooth and hairless, he seemed to be quite a bit shorter, and after a quick pat down he noticed that 'Rick Jr.' was no longer present.

"Ha ha very funny." Rick said as to his wife who was holding her side she was laughing so hard, "But just because you did this to me doesn't mean I have to go with you." Rick said as he sat back down on the couch, now with significantly more bounce.

"No can do. Take a look at the coupon Ricki with an I."

Rick took the coupon and gave a groan at what it said as he read it out loud, "This coupon entitles the holder to a girl's day out. Failure to do so will result in a serious penalty.' What the hell does that mean? Serious penalty?"

Lillie shrugged, "I don't know. Maybe I decide that, maybe the coupon decides it. We won't find out til you test it. But do you really want to test it?" Lillie couldn't help but smile at the last statement.

Rick shuddered, "No no no I do not. Come on, let's get this over with." Rick said getting up and heading for the door.

"What are you doing? You're not going out like that!" Lillie said mortified at her girly husband.

"Fine, I'll put on some jeans, quit nagging at me." Rick said as he staggered back to their room in his white undershirt and hole riddled sweat pants.

"Let me help you out." Lillie said leading Rick to her half (more like 4/5) of the closet.

"No way! I'm still me and I'm still wearing my cloths." Rick said stubbornly.

"Rick, first off no self respecting woman would wear your normal cloths."

"I'm not a self respecting woman!"

"Second," Lillie said plowing on, "look at your size, you couldn't fit in your cloths, you'll fit much better in mine...as a matter of fact..." Lillie said eyeballing her husband from head to toe before grabbing a sundress from the closet. "Here, put this on."

"Fine, but just for a minute to shut...to make you happy." So after a bit of struggling and confusion Rick managed to maneuver his way into the dress. "There, it fits I guess."

"It's a prefect fit! Now take that off and put these on." Lillie said excitedly tossing Rick a pair of her bra and panties.

"But I just got this on." Rick wined before ultimately doing as he was told. "There, happy."

"Perfect fit again." Lillie said more to herself than anything, "You know what I think? I think the magic made you pretty much exactly the same as me at least measurements wise from the neck down."

"But I'm not you. I still have my color hair and my birthmark and my face kind of."

"That's why I said you had my measurements. Oh this is going to be great! We can go dress shopping and I don't have to put a thing on, you'll get to model everything for me!" Lillie said excitedly giving her husband a boob squishing hug.

"Yay." Rick said less than enthusiastically.
1111221121112.title: Rick gets in touch with his feminine side

choices: Evening out at the bar, it's ladies night
Go to a spa for massages and pampering
11112211211121.content:
"You know, I thought all the cloth would look elegant, but really it's just unflattering to your curves." Lillie said to Rick after he stepped out of the dressing room. Rick didn't say a word and turned back to take of this dress and try on another. After about the 20th dress he tried on he figured out if he talked, Lillie would talk back, and he'd be stuck trying on dresses even longer than he already had been. Pretty soon in just a minute or two he had stepped out for another critic as the process repeated in a seemingly endless look. Throughout his marriage he'd taken dresses off his wife before plenty of times, but now he was a bit ashamed to admit, he'd become proficient in putting them on.

"Oh that blue is absolutely perfect on you, very kind to your body and eyes. We'll take that one too," Lillie said happily.

"Too?" Rick said confused.

"Oh I picked mine out about an hour ago, we've been shopping for one for you since then," Lillie replied matter of factually.

"But...why? I don't need a freaking dress. When the hell am I ever going to need a dress?"

"Oh...you never know." Lillie said patting her purse when she kept the coupons, "Better safe than sorry, right Ricki?"

"Uh..." Rick knew he had to pick his words carefully, "yeah."

"Alright, now that we have that settled, let's go out and have some fun!"

"But I don't want to have fun. I want to go home!" Rick said sounding particularly cute and whiny.

"Oh honey. No." Lillie simply said, "Remember, the coupon said girl's day out. You didn't think that just meant shopping did you?"

"Well kinda." Rick said, how was he supposed to know women did more than shop.

"Don't worry, I know just what we can do that you'll absolutely love."
11112211211121.title: Rick and Lillie got shopping

111122112111212.content:
Before Lillie could answer; a voice called out to her. "Lillie, over here!" cried out. A tall blonde was walking towards them, a smaller blonde resting her head on her shoulder. "Lillie; I thought it was you! It's Ashley from the book group. Good to see you!" she exclaimed. The tall blonde was young, in her early twenties as was the girl next to her. Ricki eyed them both, his thoughts obvious.

"Good to see you too, Ash! And um...I'm sorry this is..." "This is Jane, my soul mate. Jane, this is Lillie and I believe her spouse Ricki, right?" she asked. Ricki was surprised to get caught out and stammered a yes as Lillie glared at him. Jane shook both of their hands, her eyes seemed almost glazed.

"It's a wonderful day, today! Jane and I are heading to the spa for massages and pampering! The TG Resort Spa! Where are you two heading?" she asked.

"Actually Ash...we're heading to the Rose Spa for some massages and pampering!" replied Lillie. Ricki suppressed his distaste.

"The Rose Spa? Is that still open? OK, fair enough! Have a nice day, ladies!" responded Ashley, taking Jane with her as they waved goodbye.

"Your friend is a bitch!" cried Ricki, when she was out of earshot. "Interesting reaction, seeing you were ogling them!" snarled Lillie, somewhat peeved. Ricki shook his head, vehemently. "No! I was just....I mean they're lesbians!" he managed to stutter.

"Men and their obsession with lesbians!" Lillie suddenly beamed. "Well if you like lesbians so much...I think we might be a lesbian couple for a while!" Ricki shook his head, even more vehemently but Lillie patted the purse holding the coupons. Ricki stopped shaking his head, defeated. Why did we have to stare at the hot lesbian couple?

"Here we are, dear wife!" Lillie practically sang as they found themselves at the Rose Spa. A receptionist wearing a bikini top, smiled at them. Ricki quickly looked away, going red. Lillie smiled, glad that Ricki was learning. "So what can I do for you ladies?" asked the bikini clad receptionist. "Well we would like...."
111122112111212.title: Go to a spa for massages and pampering

choices: Stay with Ricki and learn of her punishment
Go with Lillie and enjoy a beauty treatment
1111221121112121.content:
"Men and their obsession with lesbians!" Lillie suddenly beamed. "Well if you like lesbians so much...I think we might be a lesbian couple for a while!" Ricki shook his head, even more vehemently but Lillie patted the purse holding the coupons. Ricki stopped shaking his head, defeated. Why did he have to stare at the hot lesbian couple?

"Here we are my dear wife!" Lillie practically sang as they found themselves at the Rose Spa. A receptionist wearing a bikini top, smiled at them. Ricki quickly looked away, going red. Lillie smiled, glad that Ricki was learning. "So what can I do for you ladies?" asked the bikini clad receptionist. "Well we would like pedicures then a full massage. Tell about your masseuses." she said. "Well, miss, all of our masseuses are licensed professionals with considerable experiences in the craft!" explained the receptionist.

"Are there male masseuses?" she asked, smirking at Ricki. "NO! Please baby, no! We're married, I don't want so beefcake b****** getting his hands on us! Please Lillie, I'm sorry!" Ricki wailed. "Relax my darling bride! They only have female masseuses!" she remarked, smirking. "My, my! And what if I may ask did Ricki do?" enquired the receptionist, smirking.

"She forgot my birthday! So she got a last minute present, which she tried to take back afterwards" responded Lillie, the indignity clear in her voice. "My, that's naughty! I had a boyfriend like that! His name was Eric. Now I have a new girlfriend called Erika, who is the most wonderful lover, friend and soul mate ever! She never forgets my birthday! And she works here as a full masseuse!" giggled the receptionist.

"Does she do manicures and pedicures?" asked Lillie. "Oh yes! Be careful, she is a bit of a tickler!" explained the bikini clad administrator. "Then Ricki will have her for the full package, while I have someone else!" answered Lillie. Ricki shook his head no, pleading with his round eyes. Lillie simply patted her purse again, deflating Ricki. "Very good, Miss! By the way, I am Magnilla Larsson!" added Magnilla.

"Please to meet you, Magnilla!" replied Lillie, shaking her head. Erika appeared, smiling. "Hi beloved!" she greeted Magnilla, kissing her tenderly on the lips. Lillie looked away, but again noticed Ricki staring again. Perhaps the only way he would learn respect would be to stay a woman for a while.

Erika was a beautiful woman, redheaded, a doppelganger for Summer Glau. If Lillie was honest, she would admit that she was starting to understand the obsession. She was finding herself becoming more and more attracted to Ricki. Her husband made an exceedingly attractive woman. Maybe deep down, she wanted Ricki to stay a woman.

Magnilla broke the kiss, beaming at Erika. Erika beamed back, before turning to Ricki and Lillie. "So which one is my victim?" she enquired, teasingly. Ricki seemed to shrink from her, making Lillie smirk. "This one!" declared Lillie, pointing at her wife. "What's your name, naughty girl?" she questioned Ricki in a fake stern voice. "R-Ricki!" she stammered. "I'm Lillie, Ricki's wife! Ricki has been naughty!" revealed Lillie, enjoying Ricki's nervousness.

"And what horrendous crime or crimes has she committed?" asked Erika. "She tried to take back a last minute gift, love coupons! And before that, she would just drink beer and not help with the chores!" exclaimed Lillie. "My, that is terrible. Someone has been naughty, hasn't she? Well then, a full massage will teach her to be a better wife!" pronounced Erika with a very imperious voice. Ricki could only squeak as Erika led her away.
1111221121112121.title: pedicures

choices: Failure to have a proper girl's day out results in permanent girl's day out
The Penalty is to stay a girl for another 3 months
11112211211121212.content:
Lillie forgot her troubles with a series of treatments. First the familiar resting in mud, while her fingers were done. The Spa had the added advantage of fixing her hair while she rested, unusual for most centres. She could hear the gentle music as she found her stress unwinding. Those coupons were a god sent. Whoever tricked Ricki into getting them was her hero.

"Poor darling Ricki!" she thought, giggling. "I wonder how vulnerable she is to a well placed finger! Maybe until she turns back, I might introduce her to a few giggles. After all she never hesitates to give me a few!" she thought. The thought of Ricki, without her clothes, bound and howling with laughter as her little hollows were explored or her soles stroked brought an immediate reaction from Lillie.

She knew that Ricki was a very sexy woman. It seemed that being female simply enhanced that side of her. She wondered if she wouldn't prefer Ricki stayed that way. She was so nice and well less argumentative this way. She was so vulnerable and maybe Lillie wanted to be the loving protector for once. But she dismissed those thoughts immediately. That simply wasn't being fair. Ricki wasn't a woman and it would be cruel to put her through that.

Two beautiful women entered the room. One was tiny with blonde hair (http://ilbucodellorsono.files.wordpress....). While the other was a blonde/brunette (http://img004.lazygirls.info/people/tamz...).

From the way, the little blonde was pressed against her taller friend, it was clear these two were not platonic. This was underscored when the brunette lifted the light haired blonde into her arms as she climbed into the mud.

Lillie couldn't help but watching them jealously as the little blonde cuddled up to the brunette, resting her head against her chest. They were so adorable and sexy. The women served them in no way different to Lillie. Lillie requested for the cucumber eyes as she had no desire to watch the two pretty girls jealously. After a quick nap, she awoke to find herself getting a through massage. It was relaxing as the pampering left her feeling magnificent. As she felt her body starting to react, the young masseuse intensified her rubbing.

After an expected climax, she left for a nice shower. Her thoughts felt again to the two beautiful girls and again to Ricki. Ricki laughing, Ricki's body, Lillie's tongue travelling to her centre. After a series of release that made Lillie feel somewhat promiscuous, she nevertheless made it back to the counter. Magnilla and Erika were there, their lips locked together. Ricki was waiting for Lillie, looking a little shaky.

Lillie ran up to her, hugging her tightly. To her surprise, Ricki held her just as tight, relief clear in their reunion. Erika separated from Magnilla, giggling as she watched you both. "I hope you don;t mind, Lillie. I had a heart to heart with your wife about her behaviour. She truly does love you and is quite contrite! I think you will find your married life much approved. That's how it is between Magnilla and I!" she revealed as she pressed herself against Magnilla.

Ricki was far quieter as the two of you had a quiet dinner. She was affectionate though, every so often surprising you with kisses. When the dinner was finished, she helpt you with the plates. "You're being very helpful! I like this part of you!" Lillie declared. Ricki blushed adorably, before answering "Erika told me a weird story about her brother. That he got turned into a girl and punished by his girlfriend. It freaked me a little and I realised how much that selfish jerk sounded like me! I don't want to be that guy!"

Lillie put the dishes down and grabbed Ricki, firmly pressing herself against her wife. Ricki's surprise quickly turned to reciprocation and all thoughts left them as they dashed to the bedroom to express their love. "Wow, that....wow!" was all Ricki could say as she rested her head on Lillie's chest, just as the blonde girl had with the brunette. "Well I guess it's time to turn you back....unless you want to stay like this a bit longer?" suggested Lillie, hopefully.

"Honestly I'm worried that if i don't go back now, I never will; so we should get the coupons to turn me back now!" admitted Ricki. Lillie agreed, though she hid her disappointment. She reached for the coupons and stared at them horrified. "What?" asked Ricki, terrified. Lillie showed Ricki what the love coupon showed, shakily.
11112211211121212.title: Go with Lillie and enjoy a beauty treatment

111122112111212121.content:
"What does that mean?" squealed Ricki. "I...I guess...I don't know. Maybe...you can't go back?" Lillie expressed. "NO! It...It can't mean that! Please Lillie, NO!" she screamed, before bursting into tears. Lillie held her wife tenderly as she bawled her eyes out. "It's alright, baby! We will think of something! You just cuddle up to me, it will be ok!" Lillie lied, stroking her wife's hair. She didn't understand it herself. Hadn't Ricki done exactly what she was asked to do?

"Erika!" gasped Lillie. Ricki looked up, confused. Her eyes were red from crying. Lillie wiped away her tears before explaining. "Erika that masseuse must have done something to you! Erika told you that story about her brother. It must have been deliberately aimed at you! Somehow she did this, so you couldn't turn back! Remember what she said about our married life being much improved!" Ricki paused before gasping. "What if Erika is her own brother? Didn't that girl Magnilla say she punished her boyfriend?"

Lillie took a moment before nodding. "It makes total sense! Those two girls must know what happened. Tomorrow we will go and confront those two evil cows! For now, just go to sleep, honey!” she advised her new wife. “B-But I-I have no pyjamas that will fit!” she complains, stammering. “Sweetie, we will just both have to go to sleep n***. If you are okay with that, that is?” Lillie offered. Ricki nodded in a very enthusiastic manner. Lillie ran her fingers through Ricki’s hair, stroking her tenderly. Ricki closed her eyes and quickly entered the land of NOD.

Lillie watched Ricki fall asleep, resting on top of her. She suspected that Ricki might never go back. She felt a stab of guilt that this was all her fault, especially since she wanted Ricki to stay a girl. “She’s just so beautiful! Am I secretly gay or is this just a result of whatever the coupons actually do?” she wondered. She tried to think about what Ricki looked like as a man, but found it too uncomfortable, squinting and having facial tics at the thought of Ricki as anything but the sexy woman, resting against her. “I need to sleep, tomorrow I can figure this out!” she concluded as she closed her eyes, her mind finally closing off for the night.
111122112111212121.title: Failure to have a proper girl's day out res...

1111221121112122.content:
"Well we would like massages, please!" answered Lillie. "Girls massaging us, of course! We're lesbians! A married lesbian couple! No men! Right, baby?" exclaimed Ricki, his nervousness obvious.

Lillie grinned evilly, but decided to take pity on Ricki. "You needn't worry, ma'am! The spa only hires female masseuses! Is someone in trouble?" she asked, smirkingly.

"Ricki forgot my birthday!" revealed Lillie. "My, my! That is naughty! Do you would Ricki to get a special massage?" the receptionist asked. "NO! Please no! Whatever the hell that is, no!" squealed Ricki. The receptionist giggled. "My boyfriend is the same as your wife! He never remembers my birthday!"

"Well this is not the first birthday, Ricki has forgotten!" pointed out Lillie, annoyed. "I...but I got you the gift at least, this year!" stammered Ricki, his nerves still on edge.

"Ricki got me a love gift, she tried to take back!" explained Lillie. The receptionist shook her head.

"My boyfriend tried some Love coupons and tried to skim out! But I taught him a lesson or two!" she replied, giggling.

Lillie stared at the receptionist who winked at her. Lillie beamed back. Ricki looked between Lillie and the receptionist and gasped. "You...I mean....What..."

"Your 'wife' isn't always coherent. I guess the love coupons haven't been totally effective." suggested the receptionist.

Before Lillie could respond, a redhead entered. She was wearing only a bikini top and a sarong. She looked like a redheaded Summer Glau.

"Oh my god! Baby, you won't believe...oh hello!" she stated upon seeing Lillie and Ricki.
1111221121112122.title: massages

info.brief_description: A man buys magical transformation/body swap coupons instead of Love coupons.
info.description:
So for those of who are not familiar with Love Coupons, It is a form of voluntary IOU or promissory note that contains a promise from one of the partners in a relationship to engage in a specific activity at a time in the future.

So in this story the main character ends up in the dog house and in an attempt to make it up to his wife or girlfriend he buys what he thinks are love coupons but are actually magical coupons that allow her to either swap bodies with him and make him do things that she doesn't want to or transform him in some amusing way.

Remember he is in the dog house for a reason, so letâs see if he is really ready to make it up to her.

Right now Iâm not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
